DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy SPD489 compare placebo treatment moderate severe binge eat disorder measure number binge day per week
DOC.brief_title: Forced-dose Titration SPD489 Adults With Binge Eating Disorder
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Subject meet follow Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders Fourth Edition Text Revision ( DSMIVTR ) criteria diagnosis binge eat disorder ( BED ) . Binge eat disorder least moderate severity subject report least 3 binge eating day per week . Subject body mass index ( BMI ) > 24 < 46 . Exclusion Subject concurrent symptom bulimia nervosa anorexia nervosa . Subject consider suicide risk risk harm others .
